EmailTemplate.name: User Groups.March Malaysia US
EmailTemplate.subject: Spring User Group - Malaysia
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Spring User Group Spring framework helps development teams everywhere build simple, portable, fast and flexible JVM-based systems and applications. The Spring@Pivotal Malaysia 2014 is held at Charleston, Menara UE3 (Beside Viva Home Mall) <https://maps.google.com.my/maps?daddr=3.123568,101.719965&hl=en&sll=3.123451,101.720583&sspn=0.003209,0.004823&mra=mift&mrsp=1&sz=18&t=m&z=18>. This year is the first year Spring@Pivotal is organized in Malaysia, we can learn a new thing or know more people through this event. If you are interested, please join us at Spring@Pivotal Malaysia 2014!
And if you'd like to learn more and become Spring-certified, please contact our training partner:
Training Partner Contact Us
Spring Web March 24-27 2014
Charleston info@charleston.com.my <mailto:info@charleston.com.my>
Core Spring April 7-10 2014 Charleston <http://www.courseandexam.com/instructor-led-classroom-training/go-pivotal/spring-web.html>info@charleston.com.my <mailto:info@charleston.com.my> Malaysia
Tuesday, March 4 7:30pm-9:30pm (Malaysia, Malaysia) Register <https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1E8S2SzmEAR-_InT9IZ13UTpPy_S6kAsTmuf-eyynPaQ/viewform>
